bwg.wikipedia_tasks¶

Module contents¶

NLP Pipeline tasks connected to resources of the Wikimedia Foundation.

Bases: luigi.task.Task, bwg.mixins.ArticleProcessingMixin, bwg.wikidata.WikidataAPIMixin

Add attributes from Wikidata to Named Entities.
